about.title:
I don't just build products—
I engineer economic systems.
about.signature: The Business Analyst Who Codes. The Architect Who Scales.
paragraphs: I'm the Founder of Tektōns LTD, a Ghanaian TECH & AI startup conglomerate: one intelligence core, infinite market vectors.

My origin story is unconventional. I trained as an accountant—BSc in Administration (Accounting)—where I learned to think in unit economics, margin architecture, and risk mitigation. But I taught myself to build. Today, I am currently pursuing a second degree in Computer Science and I lead R&D in Go, Python, and React, architecting backend systems that scale to millions.
This dual fluency is my moat.

In venture building, most technical founders bleed runway chasing product-market fit. Most finance-first operators can't iterate fast enough to survive. I do both. I model the CAC:LTV ratios before I write the first microservice. I stress-test the P&L while the codebase compiles.
The result? High-margin AI products designed for profitability from Day Zero.

I'm not seeking capital to discover a business model.
I'm seeking capital to accelerate an ecosystem already in motion.
